articles.title: 'Sister Wives' Star Gwendlyn Brown Says She 'Doesn't Really Like' Dad Kody's Wife Robyn - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Gwendlyn gave her candid take on a recent 'Sister Wives' episode while answering lots of fan questions about Kody and Robyn.
articles.content: Gwendlyn Brown is keeping it real when it comes to her family's drama on Sister Wives. The 21-year-old daughter of Kody Brown and his ex-wife, Christine Brown, who describes herself as both autistic … [+4030 chars]
